page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SIMON
page.content: I'm always the first to get up in the morning. I get washed and dressed and go downstairs to breakfast. I have 'Start'the rest have 'Readibreak'then I go to school. First we have Maths then Assembly followed by play time. After play its English and French. After lunch play we have Reading then Games; some play cricket and some play rounders. After last play we have Drama or Art, if we have finished our English! At 3.45 we go home. When I get home I watch telly. My best programme is Dallas but it is not on until 8 O'clock.Before that I watch Children's I.T.V. then go to Gregory's. We sometimes go to play on the rope swings in the wood. I come in at 7 O'clock and its only an hour to Dallas. Then I go to bed. _
